sections.heading: standards, defined.Program standards means the supplemental guidelines and uniform methods and rules adopted and approved by USDA/APHIS/VS for further clarification of established procedures for the regulation, control, eradication, and enforcement of livestock program diseases

sections.text:
54-2930.Program standards, defined.

Program standards means the supplemental guidelines and uniform methods and rules adopted and approved by USDA/APHIS/VS for further clarification of established procedures for the regulation, control, eradication, and enforcement of livestock program diseases.

SourceLaws 2020, LB344, ยง 30.
